channel.title: Once the official Moparscape Server comes out
channel.description: Once the official Moparscape Server comes out what will happen to the advertise your server thread? Will this be it's own website and the server will have another site? Or will it just keep using this site and allow people to still advertise?

item.title: Once the official Moparscape Server comes out
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Yeah I’m not looking for a confession from you guys or anything I’m just clearing up that it won’t be a monetised sever and saying that MITB had never really had any problems with paying for a quality server. Glad you’re getting something for it though.

Read full topic
item.source: Once the official Moparscape Server comes out

item.title: Once the official Moparscape Server comes out
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Davidi2:

I was completely expecting to do it for free (see: all of my previous work). sinisoul asked about payment and MITB threw out the idea of a simple adsense that would be split between developers and contributors to the server. I’m obviously not going to say no to compensation for the work I’ve put into the source, but at the same time I wont be upset if that doesn’t work out and I don’t get anything except the satisfaction of the server being successful.

Read full topic
item.source: Once the official Moparscape Server comes out

item.title: Once the official Moparscape Server comes out
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I was completely expecting to do it for free (see: all of my previous work). sinisoul asked about payment and MITB threw out the idea of a simple adsense that would be split between developers and contributors to the server. I’m obviously not going to say no to compensation for the work I’ve put into the source, but at the same time I wont be upset if that doesn’t work out and I don’t get anything except the satisfaction of the server being successful.

Read full topic
item.source: Once the official Moparscape Server comes out

item.title: Once the official Moparscape Server comes out
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:7, topic:549549”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=668445.msg4470770#msg4470770 date=1422789124]

Basically nothing will change. Well, I mean, there will be some parts of the site dedicated to the server.
But the SSP will be generally the exact same, just with the mopar server on it, and probably the same goes for the advertisement section.

I don’t see mitb making money off the server, or if he does, it won’t be as much as he gets with advertisers.

The server won’t be monetized at all. The only income from it will be clickable ads which go to MITB’s adsense and pay for server costs. I’m sure eventually some of the money will worm its way into the developers though, MITB has always said if he found a server to be of good enough quality he’d buy it.

I’ve already overheard there are benefits for developers of the MoparServer.
If I remember correctly, something about ad money was discussed.

[/quote]
It would only make sense, they’re putting their time and effort into it. Can’t expect people to do quality work for jack shit mate.[/quote]I disagree. See: everything I’ve ever done. Except remove the quality part.

Read full topic
item.source: Once the official Moparscape Server comes out

item.title: Once the official Moparscape Server comes out

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:549549”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=668445.msg4470769#msg4470769 date=1422788944]

Basically nothing will change. Well, I mean, there will be some parts of the site dedicated to the server.
But the SSP will be generally the exact same, just with the mopar server on it, and probably the same goes for the advertisement section.

I don’t see mitb making money off the server, or if he does, it won’t be as much as he gets with advertisers.

The server won’t be monetized at all. The only income from it will be clickable ads which go to MITB’s adsense and pay for server costs. I’m sure eventually some of the money will worm its way into the developers though, MITB has always said if he found a server to be of good enough quality he’d buy it.
[/quote]
I’ve already overheard there are benefits for developers of the MoparServer.
If I remember correctly, something about ad money was discussed.[/quote]
It would only make sense, they’re putting their time and effort into it. Can’t expect people to do quality work for jack shit mate.

Read full topic

item.title: Once the official Moparscape Server comes out
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I doubt the administration team will remove all of the advertisement aspects of this website, that wouldn’t make sense after how long this place has been doing as such. The server (and from what I’ve seen from threads) will be a simple plus to this community and in hopes that it’ll boost our activity a lot.

Read full topic
